# Bonjour & Welcome to Pavailler™ USA

## (Pavailler name and logo are trademark of S.E.B.P. France)

We are an American company incorporated in 2008 with EIN # 26-3464126 that
proudly services Pavailler baking equipment across the United States. We
strive to provide you every level of support needed, from purchasing and
installation, to maintenance and serving.

Pavailler US is a privately owned business name that is not affiliated with
Pavailler France or S.E.B.P. France.

Contact us: (301) 605-7305 | contact@pavaillerusa.com
